abstract: Howard E Wolpe, backer of 1986 Anti-Apartheid act, dies at age 71.
snippet: Mr. Wolpe played a key role in passing legislation that imposed economic sanctions on South Africa, despite two vetoes by President Ronald Reagan.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Wolpe played a key role in passing legislation that imposed economic sanctions on South Africa, despite two vetoes by President Ronald Reagan.

headline.main: Howard Wolpe, Backer of ’86 Anti-Apartheid Act, Dies at 71
headline.print_headline: Howard Wolpe, 71, Backer Of ’86 Anti-Apartheid Act
headline.seo: Ex-Congressman Howard Wolpe, Who Pushed for Anti-Apartheid Act, Dies at 71
